Description: The Point at Park Station radiates warmth, comfort, and ease from the moment you approach the lush, gorgeous surroundings. The legendary look of traditional style and the elegant feel of clean architectural lines compose the best residential community in Manassas Park, Virginia. We are a pet friendly community that is located minutes from Route 28, near the VRE and in close proximity to Dulles Airport and Lockheed Martin. Situated in one of the country's most desirable places to live and work, this stunning apartment community reveals comfort and style with built in bookcases and gas fireplaces. You can unwind while soaking in your very own over-sized tub. Come visit us today and find out why Park Station is everything you desire in a home. Please call for an appointment today.

Description: Palisades at Manassas Park offers one and two bedroom apartment homes in a beautiful setting that combines the comforts of home with superior resident services, luxurious apartment features and outstanding community amenities. Walking distance from Virginia Railroad Express station makes getting to and from DC a breeze.

Monthly Fees:
* Assigned Garage Parking: $165 - 190
* Cat Rent: $35
* Dog Rent: $35
* Trash Removal: Included

Pet Policy:
Dogs Allowed:
We welcome up to 2 pets per apartment home. We accept cats and dogs. Weight limit is 75lbs. There is a one time pet fee of $350. There is also a monthly per rent ranging from $35 - $45. Please call our leasing office for complete pet policy. 2 Pet Limit per Apartment.

Description: The Residences at City Center is a vibrant community that is continuously in motion for play, shopping, dining and of course living. Beautiful landscape surrounds the sleek lines of our mid-rise buildings giving the community a classic warmth with a modern twist. Choose from our spacious one and two bedroom floor plans, designed to complement your lifestyle. Relax in the Resident Lounge or enjoy a workout in our state of the art fitness center. The Residences at City Center is located in one of Manassas Park's most desired locations; steps away from the Virginia Railway Express station, minutes from Route 28 and Interstate 66.

Description: Beautiful End Unit Garage Townhouse within walking distance to VRE. Bright and spacious luxury living on 3 finished levels. Hardwood floors throughout ML. Gourmet eat in kitchen with granite stainless and center island. Lg deck off kitchen. Master bedroom with huge WI closet & ensuite bath w/ soaking tub. Enjoy the cozy fireplace in the LL w/ walkout to fully fenced private patio. 2 car garage.

Description: Gorgeous end unit built as a model home with open floor plan and high ceilings on the main level with crown molding throughout! Gourmet kitchen with designer touches including extra wet bar. Great sitting nook by the bay window. Bright and spacious master with huge walk in closets.Master bath has separate soaking tub two vanities.1 car garage! No smoking pets case by case. Available after 10/15.
